item.title: Novel Treatment Combo Ups Survival in Multiple Myeloma
item.description: Tec-Dara shows treatment effects in RRMM after just one prior line of therapy. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Hallucinogen Emergency Care May Predict Mania, BD Risk
item.description: Acute care after hallucinogen use is linked to a significantly increased risk for incident mania or bipolar disorder within 3 years, a new study shows...

item.title: Can 6 Depressive Symptoms Predict Dementia?
